name: Leafly Run
description:
Make an endless run in a jazzy and colorful world to have fun, relax and prove your characters' talents.

* Jump at the right time and avoid obstacles. -
* Challenge with the earthquakes! -
* Collect the leaves and special items on the road.
* Tap squishy stars to receive bonuses.
* Use your items to survive.
* Lots of achievements with rewards!
* Worldwide weekly competition!
* Synch and play the same progress across multiple devices.

Leafly Run is not only a timekiller game but also a great source for fun and to relax. When you challenge yourself with squishy stars and weekly ladders, it is also a perfect match for competitive players. Your speed will increase during the game and when you reach the highest speed, your best assistance will be your reflexes and your focus. Do you need as many items as you can get? Daily and repeatable achievements are waiting for you.

How long can you survive a run with maximum speed, obstacles, earthquakes as you try to collect rewards? How high can you reach?

Unlock and revive all characters and get ready for upcoming features. Because there will be more characters, more landscapes, and new abilities. Leafly Run is a true endless runner with continued feature updates.

Supported Languages:
English
Deutsch
Español
Français
日本語
한국어
Русский
Türkçe
中文
